item.title: How to make your own Simple Kernel static Disk Serial Spoofer on Windows part 2
item.description: In this tutorial we are going to find out which Kernel APIs are used to get disk serials in WIndows 11 by reverse engineering the Windows Kernel. And then patching Kernel to assign random serial disks from ring 0.

item.title: How to create your own PE Crypter with C++ from scratch
item.description: In this tutorial I am going to explain how to create a smi PE Crypter in Windows using C++ with VS. This tutorial should be enough to get you going and make your own advanced obfuscation tools for PE files.

item.title: Analyzing CryptoAPI key extraction on Windows using CryptExportKey
item.description: Doing some experiments on Windows Crypto API to gain some knowledge. We use some minimal code in C++ and x64dbg to analyze our program to see how Crypto API works.

item.title: How to make your own Simple Kernel static Disk Serial Spoofer on Windows part 1
item.description: In this tutorial we are going to find out which Kernel APIs are used to get disk serials in WIndows 11 by reverse engineering the Windows Kernel. And then patching Kernel to assign random serial disks from ring 0.

item.title: Important notes about Kernel development on Windows
item.description: Important things that you should keep in mind before starting your kernel journey!
